name: 1UPTHAT
description:
Unleash your wild side and go bananas with 1UPTHAT! Use your imagination and hidden talents to 1UP your friends. This is the game where you can put it all ONtheLINE by take pictures and videos to complete so off the wall challenges. This isn't monkey see monkey do this is the King Kong of apps. So go against every bone in your body and let's monkey around for a bit with 1UPTHAT! So put the challenge out there and let your friends know that you won't be 1UPed. Send them a picture or video via Facebook or Twitter and tell them to 1UPTHAT!

App features include:

- PLAY HEAD TO HEAD AGAINST FRIENDS
- CREATE MULTIPLE TEAMS WITH MULTIPLE TEAMMATES
- Share videos & pictures on Facebook and/or Twitter
- DON'T LIKE A CHALLENGE BLOW IT AWAY WITH A BANANA BOMB AND GET A CHOICE OF THREE NEW CHALLENGES TO PICK FROM
- GET CREATIVE AND INVENT YOUR OWN CHALLENGES AND DARE YOUR FRIENDS TO 1UPTHAT
- SET THE LEGNTH OF YOUR GAME
